label: Organization & Formatting
description: Several or all formatting guidelines not followed.

label: Research Question
description: Research question is clear, focused, concise, complex, and arguable.

label: Research Question
description: Research question is reasonably clear and focused, but may be too simple, too complex, or too verbose.

label: Research Question
description: Research question is unclear and lacks focus; question is far too simple or overly complex.

label: Data Sources
description: Data sources are clearly described with valid urls or citations used; validity of and concerns about data are discussed; data dictionaries included in appendix.

label: Data Sources
description: Some data sources are not clearly described or urls / citations are missnig; validity of and concerns about data are minimally discussed; data dictionaries are in appendix.

label: Data Sources
description: Data sources are poorly described or missing; description of validity of and concerns about data are poor or missing; no data dictionaries provided.

label: Slide Design
description: Slides are well-designed and well-organized to effectively communicate a coherent story addressing research question.

label: Slide Design
description: Slides are largely well-designed and well-organized, but some include distracting or confusing elements; story is not fully coherent.

label: Slide Design
description: Slides are poorly-designed and organized; frequent use of bullets and lots of text; story is poorly developed and / or does not address research question.

label: Communication
description: Engaging speaking; all team members participate; research question clearly addressed.

label: Communication
description: Speaking is somewhat engaging; all team members participate; research question clearly addressed.

label: Communication
description: Speaking is not engaging; not all team members participate; research question poorly addressed.
